text: Went yesterday and the vegan meal we had was excellent. Started off with organic split pea soup, followed it with beetroot wild rice biryani and finished off with blueberry cheesecake with ice-cream. Couldn't fault it at all. Elaine at front of house couldn't have been friendlier and the price was very reasonable.    We've been quite a few times and always been well satisfied.
great vegetarian food and some interesting flavours of tea- however the cafe is quite tiny so it's hard to find a seat in there at times.
Sweet potato pie mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm    The best Vegetarian place in Scarborough
good vegetarian cooking,at modest price. a must for good food people.
